name: ZehnderConnect
0:
”Alexa, set ventilation preset to {away/low/medium/high} at {device name}”
”Alexa, set heat recovery to {on / off} at {device name}”
”Alexa, {turn on|turn off} Heated dor on {device name}”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Our Products are radiators and air ventilation systems, this skill is for controlling these products. 

Actually, the following products are supported:
ComfoAir Q
Zenia

To make use of this Skill you need at first activate the Cloud functionality on the corresponding Mobile App
It is called ComfoAir Q and has a corresponding app, the „Comfo Control“ app in the Google Play Store. To get the latest version of the app, please join the beta program.
